column4: when i watch a video under xine or movie player, green color is on human faces ... the video runs normal under VLC
is it a bug with nvidia ?
i had the same problem a long time ago, allthough im not sure if it was with the same program, but also an nvidia card (a 5700) never solved it i think
yes and when removing the proprietary driver (177) videos run with no problem, but compiz is down ...
